rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses testing plans using neutral language.
The segment describes a plan ('will test'), which is Neutral for Q3.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports planned actions but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a planned measure/capability ('the department will test other flocks') and collaboration ('in collaboration with federal and industry associates') without explicit reassurance.
